description: A statistical breakdown of the age of Civilian Complaint Review Board (CCRB) substantiated cases, by year, measured from the date of the incidents in the years 2205 through 2009.The age of the docket is measured by the number of open cases at the end of each reporting period.

name: CCRB: Age of Substantiated Cases Measured from the Date of Incident 2005 - 2009
